title: Disney and YouTube Reach Deal, Ending Blackout
sub_head: Agreement ends a standoff that left YouTube TV subscribers without Disney channels for much of the weekend
body:
YouTube TV and Walt Disney Co. reached a deal Sunday to restore access to Disney-owned channels including ESPN and FX for YouTube TV subscribers.
The deal ended a brief blackout that began at the stroke of midnight Saturday after the carriage contract between the two companies expired. YouTube TV has more than four million subscribers, according to a person familiar with the operation.
